oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Buttons recovered from Morgan County, Tennessee.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Buttons recovered from the area around Montgomery, Morgan County, Tennessee. The area was known to witnessed several skirmishes during the Civil War. Montgomery sat on the road between Nashville and Knoxville. The buttons include an 1812 era officer button, and 1840s William Henry Harrison log cabin button, a Georgia State Seal, US Eagle "I" buttons, US general service buttons, floral cuff buttons, and coin buttons.
